text: And Gedeon said to him, Be gracious 6. 13 Heb. כי a particle of entreaty, here rendered literally.with me, my Lord: but if the Lord is with us, why have these evils found us? and where are all his miracles, which our fathers have related to us, saying, Did not the Lord bring us up out of Egypt? and now he has cast us out, and given us into the hand of Madiam.
